title.narrative: Scaling-up Resilience to One Million People in the Niger River Basin (SUR1M) (BRACED)

description.narrative: Its main components are: 1. Livelihoods: Climate-smart agriculture, natural resource management, SILC, child nutrition, value chains (cowpeas, poultry, small ruminants, seeds multiplication and distribution in partnership with a local private company in Niger. 2. Governance: DRR, communal and civil society governance, small grants 3. Gender: increased revenues including through SILC groups, participation in decision-making, child protection, access to land, access to time and fuel energy saving technologies.
The project targets 758 755 people in 12 communes of Tillaberi Region, Niger, and 218,143 in 7 communes of Gao Region, Northern Mali.
